document_data.name: Carvers' Hall
document_data.mainbody: The '''Carvers' Hall''' was the guildhouse for a group of artisans in the capital city of [[Immilmar]] in [[Rashemen]] in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The guildhall was located in the center of the city just north of the [[Huhrong's Citadel]].
document_data.Description: The Carvers' Hall was a single storey stone building. The interior of the guildhall contained dormitories that housed visiting artists.
document_data.Activities: Several workrooms were outfitted with a wide variety of artistic tools and implements, allowing guildmembers to create works of art in comfort.
document_data.Inhabitants: The guildmaster as of 1367 DR was [[Davyrra]].
